customrecordtype.description: A custom record to hold settings that are parameters for the script. As the scripts run, they update the applicable status fields with date and when complete, the url of the file.

customrecordcustomfield.description: Last status of the Entity export program.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Last status of the Entity export program. This field is added automatically by the program that generates the Entity and Entity Type export files.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Entity Export Status

customrecordcustomfield.help: Click the link to download the Entity export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Download Entity Export File

customrecordcustomfield.help: Click the link to download the Entity Type export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Download Entity Type Export File

customrecordcustomfield.description: Last status of the Account export program. This field is added automatically by the program that generates the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Last status of the Account export program. This field is added automatically by the program that generates the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Export Status

customrecordcustomfield.help: Download the most recent Account export file
customrecordcustomfield.label: Download Account Export File

customrecordcustomfield.description: Last status of the Multi-Currency export program. This value is added automatically by the program that generates the export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Last status of the Multi-Currency export program. This value is added automatically by the program that generates the export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Multi-Currency Export Status

customrecordcustomfield.description: Download the most recent Multi-Currency export file
customrecordcustomfield.help: Download the most recent Multi-Currency export file
customrecordcustomfield.label: Download Multi-Currency Export File

customrecordcustomfield.help: When the job is done, the system will send an email to this person. Leave blank for no email.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Email Alert To

customrecordcustomfield.help: The files are saved in this folder in the FileCabinet. If the folder does not exist, it will be created.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Folder Name for Export Files

customrecordcustomfield.description: When checked, only send alerts when there is an error.
customrecordcustomfield.help: When checked, only send alerts when there is an error.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Error Alerts Only

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the currency handling option for the export.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the currency handling option for the export. Select the currency handling option for the export. Select Omit Bank Currency to ignore NS Account Currency in the final export file. When this option is selected, the NS Subsidiary Currency will be used for all the reconciliations at the BL Account level. Select Preserve Bank Currency to export the bank accounts in the NS Account Currency. When this option is selected, the NS Account Currency will be used for all bank accounts and all other accounts are exported in the NS Subsidiary Currency to reconciliations at the BL Account level.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Currency Export Option

customrecordcustomfield.description: The File API Key is used to securely access the account export file remotely from the Blackline servers. When your file is picked up by Blackline automatically, you will need to provide this File API Key to your Blackline implementation team.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
The File API Key is used to securely access the account export file remotely from the Blackline servers. When your file is picked up by Blackline automatically, you will need to provide this File API Key to your Blackline implementation team.
Clicking the "Generate New API Key" button will replace the key with a new, random value. Use this feature with caution: If a new API key is generated without coordination with Blackline, the change will break the automated file pickup and import into BlackLine.
customrecordcustomfield.label: File API Key

customrecordcustomfield.description: The data to use for key field #1 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The data to use for key field #1 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Key Field #1

customrecordcustomfield.description: A placeholder to show that key #2 is always the account.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Key #2 is always the Account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Key Field #2

customrecordcustomfield.description: The data to use for key field #2 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The data to use for key field #2 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Key Field #3

customrecordcustomfield.description: The data to use for key field #4 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The data to use for key field #4 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Key Field #4

customrecordcustomfield.description: The data to use for key field #5 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The data to use for key field #5 in the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Key Field #5

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the subsidiary to record the Currency Translation Adjustment.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the subsidiary to record the Currency Translation Adjustment.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary For Currency Translation Adj

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the currency translation adjustment account for the final currency translation difference when converting to the reporting currency. For US GAAP, this is an Equity account. If the account is left blank, the currency translation account will not be included in the Account export.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the currency translation adjustment account for the final currency translation difference when converting to the reporting currency. For US GAAP, this is an Equity account. If the account is left blank, the currency translation account will not be included in the Account export.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Currency Translation Adjustment Account

customrecordcustomfield.description: The Retained Earnings account is necessary to summarize prior period income when building the trial balance. If the account is left blank, the retained earnings will not be included in the Account export.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The Retained Earnings account is necessary to summarize prior period income when building the trial balance. If the account is left blank, the retained earnings will not be included in the Account export.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Retained Earnings Account

customrecordcustomfield.description: Filter the subsidiary for the account extract
customrecordcustomfield.help: Filter the subsidiary for the account extract
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiary Filter

customrecordcustomfield.description: Let the script compute the reporting period using the relative period value. To use a specific, custom date, use the Custom Dates option and specify the dates below.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Let the script compute the reporting period using the relative period value. To use a specific, custom date, use the Custom Dates option and specify the dates below.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Reporting Period

customrecordcustomfield.description: The starting date for the reporting period for the trial balance.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The starting date for the reporting period for the trial balance.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Reporting Period Start Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the ending date of the reporting period for the export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the ending date of the reporting period for the export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Reporting Period End Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: Run entity exports with this export profile.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This field is used when the Profile is scheduled to run. When checked, the Entity Type and Entity export files will be generated.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Entity Exports

customrecordcustomfield.description: This field is used when the Profile is scheduled to run. When checked, the Multi-Currency export file will be generated.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This field is used when the Profile is scheduled to run. When checked, the Multi-Currency export file will be generated.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Multi-Currency Exports

customrecordcustomfield.description: Run the account export with this profile.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This field is used by the Scheduler. Check this box to create the Account export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Export

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to enable the profile to run according to the schedule.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to enable the profile to run according to the schedule.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Enable Schedule

customrecordcustomfield.description: Run per the schedule on Monday
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Mondays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Monday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to run the profile on Tuesdays.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Tuesdays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Tuesday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to run the profile on Wednesday.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Tuesdays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Wednesday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to run the profile on Thursdays.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Thursdays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Thursday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to run the profile on Fridays.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Fridays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Friday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to run the profile on Saturdays.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Saturdays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Saturday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Check this box to run the profile on Sundays.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box to run the profile on Sundays.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sunday

customrecordcustomfield.description: Frequency to fun the profile.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the frequency to run the profile. The profile will only run on the days selected.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Frequency

customrecordcustomfield.description: The date the profile will stop running.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The date the profile will stop running.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Schedule Stop Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: The next schedule run date. When the job completes, this field is updated automatically.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The next schedule run date. When the job completes, this field is updated automatically.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Next Run Date

customrecordcustomfield.description: This field represents the specific time when the export is scheduled to run. Also select the "Daily at a Specific Time" option in the Frequency drop down.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This field represents the specific time when the export is scheduled to run. Also select the "Daily at a Specific Time" option in the Frequency drop down.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Run Daily At Specific Time

customrecordcustomfield.description: By default, all accounts are included in the export to create a full trial balance. Optionally, you may select a specific list of accounts to export.
customrecordcustomfield.help: By default, all accounts are included in the export to create a full trial balance. Optionally, you may select a specific list of accounts to export.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Include List

customrecordcustomfield.description: Filter account export for location
customrecordcustomfield.help: Filter account export for location
customrecordcustomfield.label: Location Filter

customrecordcustomfield.description: Include or exclude the locations in the filter list?
customrecordcustomfield.help: Include or exclude the locations in the filter list?
customrecordcustomfield.label: Include or Exclude Location List

customrecordcustomfield.description: The name of the account export file. Include YYYYMM to show the period ending year and month in the filename.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The name of the account export file. Include YYYYMM to show the period ending year and month in the filename.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Filename

customrecordcustomfield.description: This check box governs the output in the Financial Statement column of the Account export file. Typically, Balance Sheet accounts are Reconciliation and Income Statement accounts are Variance Analysis. Check this box to override the setting in the Account record with these standard settings. Note: If the Account record does not have a value, the standard account types will be used.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This check box governs the output in the Financial Statement column of the Account export file. Typically, Balance Sheet accounts are Reconciliation and Income Statement accounts are Variance Analysis. Check this box to override the setting in the Account record with these standard settings. Note: If the Account record does not have a value, the standard account types will be used.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Use Standard Account Export Types

customrecordcustomfield.description:
Account List Filter options.
Ignore: select all accounts
Include: only include the accounts selected in the multi-select box.
Exclude: select all accounts except the ones selected in the multi-select box.
Or, select categories of accounts such as balance sheet accounts.
Note: When All Balance Sheet or All Liabilities and Equity accounts are selected, Retained Earnings will include current period income.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
Account List Filter options.
Ignore: select all accounts
Include: only include the accounts selected in the multi-select box.
Exclude: select all accounts except the ones selected in the multi-select box.
Or, select categories of accounts such as balance sheet accounts.
Note: When All Balance Sheet or All Liabilities and Equity accounts are selected, Retained Earnings will include current period income.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account List Filter

customrecordcustomfield.description: This selection determines the behavior of the Account Filter list, which can be set to either an Include filter or an Exclude filter.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This selection determines the behavior of the Account Filter list, which can be set to either an Include filter or an Exclude filter.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Include or Exclude Account List?

customrecordcustomfield.description: This is the search ID of a custom Saved Search that drives the Account export. A custom search may be used to extend the keys that are used. To create a custom search, start with the existing search and add the desired key columns to the end of the search. They will automatically be added to they key positions #6 through #10 in the Account Export file. Changing the existing columns could have unintended consequences. Leave this field blank to use the default search.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the search ID of the custom Saved Search that drives the Account export. A custom search may be used to extend the keys that are used. To create a custom search, start with the existing search and add the desired key columns to the end of the search. They will automatically be added to they key positions #6 through #10 in the Account Export file. Changing the existing columns could have unintended consequences. Leave this field blank to use the default search.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bind DataSource to Saved Custom SearchID

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select specific asset accounts to export.
customrecordcustomfield.help: By default, all accounts are included in the export. Optionally, you may select a specific list of accounts to export.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Asset Account Include List

customrecordcustomfield.description: Select the liability accounts to include in the export.
customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the liability accounts to include in the export.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Liability/Equity Account Include List

customrecordcustomfield.description: The name of the multi-currency export file. Include YYYYMM to show the period ending year and month in the filename.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The name of the multi-currency export file. Include YYYYMM to show the period ending year and month in the filename.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Multi-Currency Filename

customrecordcustomfield.description:
Comma-separated list of the level names, which corresponds to the levels in the subsidiary tree, department tree, location tree, or class tree, depending on which key you selected for Field #1 in the Account export. NetSuite's root, top-level, consolidated subsidiary is Blackline's last entity type. For example, if your root subsidiary is "Consolidated," this is how your level names may look: Company,Subsidiary,Division,Consolidated
Alternatively, if a single level name is defined, an ordered list is created. For example, the default value "Level" will create an ordered list: Level 1, Level 2, Level 3.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
Comma-separated list of the level names, which corresponds to the levels in the subsidiary tree, department tree, location tree, or class tree, depending on which key you selected for Field #1 in the Account export. NetSuite's root, top-level, consolidated subsidiary is Blackline's last entity type. For example, if your root subsidiary is "Consolidated," this is how your level names may look: Company,Subsidiary,Division,Consolidated
Alternatively, if a single level name is defined, an ordered list is created. For example, the default value "Level" will create an ordered list: Level 1, Level 2, Level 3.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Account Key Field #1 Level Name(s)

customrecordcustomfield.description: The filename of the Entity Type export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The filename of the Entity Type export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Entity Type Filename

customrecordcustomfield.description: The name of the Entity export file.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The name of the Entity export file.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Entity Filename

customrecordcustomfield.description:
ScriptId of Saved Search.
The saved search will be run and an export file will be generated on demand when called by the Blackline Automatic File Pickup service. The export file is not saved in the file cabinet and as such does not require the scheduler to generate the file in advance of the Blackline Pickup service.
If the number of results exceeds 1,000 rows, the saved search must be sorted by internalid.
To include results from multiple searches in the same export, specify a comma-separated list of saved searches.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
ScriptId of Saved Search.
The saved search will be run and an export file will be generated on demand when called by the Blackline Automatic File Pickup service. The export file is not saved in the file cabinet and as such does not require the scheduler to generate the file in advance of the Blackline Pickup service.
If the number of results exceeds 1,000 rows, the saved search must be sorted by internalid.
To include results from multiple searches in the same export, specify a comma-separated list of saved searches.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Saved Search ScriptId

customrecordcustomfield.description: When checked, the column headers from the saved search will be output on the first line.
customrecordcustomfield.help: When checked, the column headers from the saved search will be output on the first line.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Output Column Headers
